Title: Provides the village of Ossining, Westchester county, with an exemption from restrictions on the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages at retail for on-premises consumption
Summary: Exempts the village of Ossining, Westchester county, from restrictions on the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages at retail for on-premises consumption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to providing the village of Ossining, Westchester county, with an exemption from restrictions on the hours of sale of alcoholic beverages at retail for on-premises consumption
